snippet: The journalist, Diing Chan Awuol,  had published articles critical of the government, its policy toward Sudan and its ties to Sudanese rebel groups.
abstract: South Sudanese journalist Diing Chan Awuol is shot and killed outside his home in capital of Juba; Chan had been threatened for publishing articles critical of the government, its policy toward Sudan and its ties to Sudanese rebel groups.
lead_paragraph: The journalist, Diing Chan Awuol,  had published articles critical of the government, its policy toward Sudan and its ties to Sudanese rebel groups.
